dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
P. Ammanabrolu
M. A. Côté
X. Yuan
dcterms:description: The Jericho Interactive Fiction environment includes 57 different games categorized into possible, difficult, and extreme games, serving as a benchmark for developing language-based agents.
dcterms:title: Jericho Interactive Fiction environment

dcterms:creator: J. He
J. Chen
X. He
J. Gao
L. Li
L. Deng
M. Ostendorf
dcterms:description: The Deep Reinforcement Relevance Network (DRRN) is a framework for choice-based and parser-based agents that encodes actions and states into embedding vectors for approximating Q-values.
dcterms:title: DRRN (Deep Reinforcement Relevance Network)

dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
R. Loynd
G. Yang
A. Swaminathan
J. D. Williams
dcterms:description: NAIL is a general interactive fiction agent capable of playing any unseen text-based game without prior training or receiving a list of valid actions.
dcterms:title: NAIL (A general interactive fiction agent)

dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
P. Ammanabrolu
M. A. Côté
X. Yuan
dcterms:description: Various text-based adventure games, including adventureland, detective, and pentari, are utilized within the Jericho environment for testing RL agents.
dcterms:title: Various text-based adventure games
